attributes.action: Enforce social workers to wear body cameras just as the police do.
attributes.additional_details: To prevent inaccurate, false and inadequate evidence. So that there is reference of the procedures of social workers policy's.
attributes.background: To capture both video and audio evidence to prevent continuous lies and assumptions that social workers countlessley get away with.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619166
